    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Cell
    Represents a single cell in the game grid, serving as the fundamental building block of the game world.
    CellType
    Enumerates all possible types of cells in the game world.
    Difficulty
    Represents the difficulty levels available in the game, each with predefined map layouts.
    Enemy
    Represents an enemy entity in the game that moves horizontally and damages the player on contact.
    GameModel
    The main game model that manages the game state, player movement, enemy behavior, and game logic for the mining adventure game.
    GameModel.Direction
    Represents the four possible movement directions for the player.
    KeyCodeManager
    Manages the generation, storage, and tracking of key codes for game progression.
    Main
    Main application class for Miner's Quest game.
    Map
    Represents the game map containing cells, enemies, and game layout.
    MapView
    Handles the visual representation and rendering of the game map.
    Miner
    Represents the player character with position, inventory, and status attributes.
    Shop
    Provides shop functionality for purchasing miner upgrades.
